title: Kaibōkan

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Submerge an ally ship tonight. All non-Warfleet players who visit them will be redirected to one of their two closest alive neighbors at random. You can only target other Warfleet members, or you yourself.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- 1491 Warlord Promotion Priority; You will be chosen first over other members, including the Carrier. You may toggle this at any time if you so wish.
- If promoted to the Warlord, all Warfleet members besides you will gain Basic defense for the next night.

fields.name: Upgrade:
fields.value:
- You may now always target enemies with your ability.
- Your redirections become silent - giving no notification.
- If promoted to the Warlord, all Warfleet members besides you become lynchproof the next day in addition to the Basic defense.

*To win with sacrifices is no true victory.*
